description: This fun family-run truck is where you’ll find some mighty tasty and authentic Hawaiian style shaved ice. They’ve been refreshing Nashville with their frozen treats since way back in 2010, and everyone just loves this shaved summer staple.They offer a variety of delicious homemade flavors, which feature all your classic favorites, along with few cool creations, like cotton candy and popcorn! They’re also happy to adjust their menu to make it perfect for you and your guests and your next festive event.Not only are they serving sweets, but you’ll soon see that their soul is sure sweet, because they donate 10% of all their proceeds to nonprofits, churches, and schools all throughout the Nashville community.So come share in the love, fun, and flavor, and call on Shave Flavs to cater your next big affair!
name: Shave Flavs
